Welcome to SeDuMi 1.2 64bit version

SeDuMi 1.2 Installation instructions

This version of SeDuMi is designed for Matlab R2007b 64 bit version.
Both Linux and Windows binaries are included, no compilation necessary.
The binaries are built using blas for improved performance.

The sources are included but compilation is not encouraged.

If you have any questions or comments you can share them at the forum at
http://sedumi.mcmaster.ca.


==========> L e t   Se Du Mi   s e d u c e   y o u   t o o   ! <==========
Imre Polik 
April 9, 2008
